entries.title: Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse trailer wows with 6 distinct animation styles
entries.description: Another sequel is already in the works, along with a Spider-Woman spinoff film.

entries.title: Lensa AI app causes a stir with sexy “Magic Avatar” images no one wanted
entries.description: Early reports said the app unwantedly sexualized depictions of women using the app.

entries.title: TikTok would be banned from US “for good” under bipartisan bill
entries.description: Lawmakers liken TikTok's widening influence in the US to "digital fentanyl."

entries.title: Only iPhones that can’t run iOS 16 are getting new iOS 15 updates
entries.description: iPhone 6S, iPhone 7, and the last iPod Touch shift to security-only update model.

entries.title: Report: Apple plans to support sideloading and third-party app stores by 2024
entries.description: Europe's Digital Markets Act was the catalyst.

entries.title: Doc raked in $3.3M in wild spinal surgery scam, gets 5 years in prison
entries.description: Patients left in "mental anguish" wondering "whether they needed a surgery."

entries.title: Microsoft digital certificates have once again been abused to sign malware
entries.description: Code-signing is supposed to make people safer. In this case, it made them less so.

entries.title: iOS 16.2, macOS 13.1 released with new collaboration features and other updates
entries.description: Smaller updates for watchOS, tvOS, and HomePod software are also available.

entries.title: Google’s Black Friday deals are back, including that $299 Pixel 6a deal
entries.description: Get $100-$150 off a Pixel phone, $50 off the watch, $10 off a Chromecast.

entries.title: Marvel’s Midnight Suns gets a big boost on PC when 2K’s launcher is removed
entries.description: One PC gaming pro gained more than 60 percent in frames per second by killing it.

entries.title: Bill Nelson came to NASA to do two things, and he’s all out of bubblegum
entries.description: Working with Congress? "It's easy as pie."

entries.title: Reminder: Donate to win swag in our annual Charity Drive sweepstakes
entries.description: Add to a charity haul that has raised over $6,500 in just 5 days.

entries.title: What enabled the big boost in fusion energy announced this week?
entries.description: Two megajoules of laser yielded three megajoules of fusion energy.

entries.title: Sam Bankman-Fried arrested in Bahamas, charged with “massive” crypto fraud in US
entries.description: FTX founder charged with fraud, money laundering, campaign finance violations.

entries.title: US COVID death toll would be 4X higher without vaccines, modeling study finds
entries.description: Shots also cut millions of hospitalizations and $1.5 trillion in medical bills.

entries.title: Twitter ditches Trust and Safety Council as Musk tweets fuel harassment
entries.description: Twitter thanks the council for their service, while members fear retaliation.

entries.title: After Russia’s exit from the Lunar Gateway, NASA has found a new partner in UAE
entries.description: The United Arab Emirates is a founding member of the Artemis Accords.

entries.title: China hits back at US chip sanctions with WTO dispute
entries.description: Beijing defends "legitimate rights" in response to Washington’s semiconductor controls.

entries.title: Plugable’s $13 USB adapter adds Bluetooth 5.0 to your older PC or build
entries.description: Windows 11 and 10 only.

entries.title: Here’s how Honda’s next electric SUV was designed during the pandemic
entries.description: Behind the scenes at Honda’s VR studio and its "Google Built-In" experience.

entries.title: Mercedes built a concept car for Avatar, and we drove it
entries.description: The collaboration may seem odd, but it made sense after we drove it.

entries.title: “Fake” Roman coins authenticated, bearing likeness of lost Roman emperor
entries.description: Analysis re-ignites debate over existence of 3rd century CE emperor named Sponsian.
